cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.current_location: about 20 miles north of Great Inagua Island
cyclone.trajectory: continuing west-northwest and then turning northwest toward the Straits of Florida and the Florida Peninsula

weather_observation.watch_coast: N/A – no watches in effect for the U.S. Virgin Islands
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane and storm-surge warnings currently confined to the Bahamas, Cuba, the Florida Keys and the south-eastern Florida coast
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern & central Bahamas, Turks and Caicos, northern Cuba coast, Florida Keys, South Florida
weather_observation.wind: Only residual breezy conditions expected; damaging winds have moved away
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected – storm well west of the Virgin Islands
